body: That SF2 animated movie style Chun Li will always be the cutest.
When you want to be a battle manga artist but can't figure out how to trick people into reading your work
The action and exposition was great, but the abysmally small amount of porn was the disappointing shit on top of an otherwise wonderful sundae.
What a waste if you want to draw battle manga then do that but don’t try to mask it under porn
If you guys want the fight scenes go read all the 87 page manga (7/10 for me tho). If you were expecting to see some hentai here dont even bother reading it's just one page.
